example.text: [[user]] has made clear that Senate Republicans are harming our national security by treating military families as political footballs. The Senator from Alabama’s hold on servicemembers' promotions is putting our troops at risk. [[url]]

We need to claw back lavish pay from failed bank executives. CEOs who blow up their banks — by loading up on risk to boost their profits and pad their pockets — should not walk away scot-free as the government cleans up their mess. I’ve got a bipartisan bill to get it done. [[url]]

I wrote the law to give Americans the option to buy over-the-counter hearing aids. And with President Biden's executive order on competition, Americans now have more options to buy affordable and effective hearing aids. [[url]]

[[user]] has a decades-long history of cheating consumers, and now they’ve been caught lying to their shareholders about their failures to clean up their act. Regulators need to break up this bank. [[url]]

For years credit card companies have profited off Americans by charging them excessive credit card late fees, costing families about $12 BILLION each year. I'm calling on the 10 largest credit card issuing banks to provide answers on fee practices. [[url]]

The revolving door between the Pentagon & high-priced defense contracting threatens our national security—it’s time to slap a padlock on it. The next Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff should make strong ethics commitments to end this practice. My op-ed:[[url]]

I wrote the law to give Americans the option to buy over-the-counter hearing aids. And with President Biden's executive order on competition, Americans now have more options to buy affordable and effective hearing aids. [[url]]
